page.title: 11An Interesting Person
page.content: My Grandfather is a very interesting person. Nearly every day he cleans his {World War II}souvenirs which include an air-raid warden's helmet and a box of bullets- mostly rifle bullets. There are many{army veterans}in my family. My Uncle was a sergeant and had his elbow down to his fingers blown off by shrapnel. My Grandfather often goes along Folkestone Cliffs admiring the{Customs Offices}where he used to work. He always enjoys gardening. My Grandfather has been{a {great influence}in my life and helped me when I could not manage and pushed me when I could go no further. He always enjoys country walks. He is very restless. After he has finished one job he has to find another job to occupy him. I am glad I have a Grandfather like this.
